DAZ: Friends, what has happened to the lifeforms within the <color=orange>Sanctuary?</color> When I visited using a voyager stone, I could only find a handful remaining inside!
2
1
OENO: Worry not, Daz. We have simply evacuated most of the lifeforms inside the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> back to the surface!
3
2
OENO: The <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> was only built as temporary shelter to shelter the native life during the operation of the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>, lacking provisions for long-term nourishment of these species.
4 2
OENO: Now that the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> has failed, there is no need to keep them indefinitely quarantined within the <color=orange>Sanctuary.</color>
5 4
DAZ: I see.. I feared the lifeforms had escaped in droves through the quantum shard, hah! But.. Why are there still some left within the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> then?
6 5
OENO: We plan to evacuate all species within the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> in due time. However, it appears a few have grown fond of this environment.. and have proven frustratingly adept at evading our grasp!
7 6
OENO: Since we can only access the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> as voyagers, these amphibious species can easily evade us underwater, or by simply swimming along the water's surface..
8 7
DAZ: Perhaps they have grown fearful of us for separating them from their friends.. We must do our best to reunite them with their friends as soon as we can!
